summary: This is an email chain between Assistant United States Attorneys in the Southern District of New York discussing revised motions in limine (MILs) and related letters for the Epstein case, including a draft index letter with victim information.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Sends and receives emails regarding revised motions in limine and letters for the Epstein case, including victim information.

events.title: Revision of Motions in Limine and Letters
events.description: Assistant United States Attorneys exchange revised motions in limine, a redline, a draft cover letter, and a draft index letter containing victim information.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated October 18, 2021, between Assistant United States Attorneys in the Southern District of New York.
The emails discuss revised motions in limine (MILs) and related draft letters for the Epstein case.
One of the draft letters is an index letter that includes victim information.
The correspondence indicates ongoing legal preparation and coordination among prosecutors in the case.
